chapters.title: Chapter 21: Embers and Ash
chapters.info: Lacile Aldorwin, p. 332—Short, pale, very slender Cairhienin woman. She walks very gracefully. She was taken captive by the Shaido along with Faile and her servants. The man who captured her, Jhoradin, fell in love with her; it is not known whether Lacile returned his feelings or was simply pretending in order to ensure her protection. She did feel much remorse about Jhoradin's death, however.
